Login.Form.Email.Label: Email Address
Login.Form.Password.Label: Password
Login.SwitchToRegisterMessage: Don't have an account? Sign up
Login.Error.BadRequest: The server was unable to process the request due to malformation or incorrect syntax
Login.Error.Unauthorized: Email and/or password are incorrect or user does not exist
Login.Error.InternalServerError: A problem with server has occured. Please try again later and if the problem persist - contact us via contact form on the main page
Login.Error.UnexpectedError: Unhandled error has occured. Contact us via contact form on the main page
